snippet: Starboard Value contends that pork producer Smithfield Foods is worth more broken up than the $34-a-share offer from Shuanghui International of China.
abstract: Starboard Value contends that pork producer Smithfield Foods is worth more broken up than the $34-a-share offer from Shuanghui International of China.

headline.main: Investor Hires Advisers in Push for Smithfield Breakup
headline.print_headline: Investor Tries To Persuade Smithfield Board To Split
